PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-07132021-07-01, 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of MARK FERDINAND of Ottawa, Ontario, who is not an officer or non-commissioned member of the Canadian Forces, nor an employee of the Department of National Defence, to be a part-time member of the Military Police Complaints Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
